name: REVERSE RAID
description:
Pilot!
This is the planet of evil Boltzmann brain Kylix!
Destroy the main data center! It is behind 15 gates.
Good luck!

Keys:

  • up(x)/left/right - thrusters;
  • z - shot.

Hints

  • You get the extra life on every 100 score;
  • Refuel then destroy balloon to earn more score;
  • You can continue the game from last gate (left/right to select gate);
  • Press up/down on the main title screen to generate non-standard levels or reset to default one.

    • And... Good luck!

    I will be glad to receive your feedback

PICO-8 BBS thread: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=38413
